title: DOJ Files Complaint Against Fiat Chrysler Automobiles (Audio)
itunes:title: DOJ Files Complaint Against Fiat Chrysler Automobiles (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Jamie Butters, an auto reporter for Bloomberg News in Detroit, discusses a U.S. Justice Department lawsuit against Fiat Chrysler Automobiles, which accuses the automaker of violating U.S. clean-air rules with its diesel vehicles. He speaks with Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
